Tayuya sweeps the opponent off of their feet, then kicks them up into the air, where she then dashes behind them. She then activates the first level of her [[Sound Four's Cursed Seals#Tayuya|cursed seal]], and delivers a bone-breaking punch to the face.

==Trivia==
* In the anime and manga, Tayuya uses the punch part of this technique against [[Naruto Uzumaki]].

[[pl:Dokuzetsu Konbo]]
